name: Shoot Terrorist War 2018
description:
Shoot Terrorist War 2018 is an action First Person Shooting war Game. You are the brave assassin in the army, aim to shoot the terrorists who mask, arm AK47, M4 ,and carry destructive weapons.Aim at the opponent's vital part to shoot ,so that those ferocious terrorists nowhere to escape.
Features:
- real shooting effect
- realistic battlefield environment
- Simple and smooth game
- powerful weapon
- amazing music and sound effects
- Challenging missions
- Fast-paced game
